Service Details: - Provides professional volunteer Search and Rescue services to the Central Okanagan area- Provides assistance and relief during civil emergencies that can be declared by the federal, provincial or local governments and can include events such as floods, fires, earthquakes or other disasters- Offers the international Hug-a-Tree and Survive program to elementary schools and a variety of customized presentations on many topics
